entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:23 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 10:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -6.4°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Wind Chill: -13
Wind: WNW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
